    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        public static void fetch(android.app.Activity activity)
        Fetches the next rewarded video ad.

        If an error happen during fetching, AdBuddizRewardedVideoDelegate.didFail(AdBuddizRewardedVideoError) will be called with the error code.

        Unlike AdBuddiz.cacheAds(Activity), this method MUST be called before each call to show(Activity).
        Parameters:
        activity - the current activity

      • isReadyToShow

        public static boolean isReadyToShow(android.app.Activity activity)
        Checks if an rewarded video ad is ready to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        activity - the current activity
        Returns:
        true if an ad is ready to be shown, false otherwise.

      • show

        public static void show(android.app.Activity activity)
        Show a rewarded video.

        If the SDK is unable to show an ad at the time this method is called, AdBuddizRewardedVideoDelegate.didFail(AdBuddizRewardedVideoError) will be called with the error code.

        fetch(Activity) must have been called at least once before any call to this method.
        Parameters:
        activity - the current activity

      • setDelegate

        public static void setDelegate(AdBuddizRewardedVideoDelegate delegate)
        Register delegate to listen to the rewarded video ad events.

      • getDelegate

        public static AdBuddizRewardedVideoDelegate getDelegate()

        public static void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
